g1_male_momayez: It is recommended not to cut the hair of the head and beard for one month before entering Ihram.
g1_general: It is disliked (makruh) to use henna before Ihram in such a way that its effect remains during Ihram
g1_female: She may use medication to delay her monthly period, with a doctorâ€™s consultation.
g2_male_item1: Two white, unstitched pieces of cloth (izar and rida)
g2_female_item1: Plain, non-adorned regular clothing for ihram
g2_general_item1: Soap, toothpaste, and shampoo without fragrance
